item.title: CoinDesk Dismisses Top Editors After Story Draws Crypto Executive's Ire
item.description: The article, since removed, featured a key CoinDesk sponsor and a $6 million banana.

item.title: The Mega Millions jackpot is nearing $1 billion — but that’s not the only reason lottery sales could see a holiday spike
item.description: Christmas also fuels one form of lottery playing in particular.

item.title: Video platform Rumble rallies on $775 million investment from an influential — and oft-scrutinized — crypto giant
item.description: The stablecoin firm plans to buy more than 103 million shares of Rumble.

item.title: Euro Likely to Weaken to Parity Against Dollar in 2025
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index fell 0.5% to 102.08 — snapping a three-trading-day winning streak.

item.title: Stocks Rally on Hopes for More Rate Cuts
item.description: Friday’s gains help, but don’t reverse, weekly declines by major indexes; Nike says it expects lower sales and margins this fiscal quarter.
